thread.title: Aurigny apologises for long delays in Alderney
thread.title_full: Aurigny apologises for long delays in Alderney - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Aurigny apologises for long delays in Alderney
text:
Only one of the four Aurigny aircrafts able to serve Alderney has been in operation over the past two days.
One plane was out of action for routine maintenance, while two others broke down.
That led to delays at Alderney's Airport on Sunday and Monday morning and anger among passengers, for which the airline has apologised.
